_xResult.title: Red women's suit
_xResult.longdesc:
Cut for a flattering slim-fit, this one-button red blazer is crafted from a lightweight, luxurious viscose fabric.
Complete with a peak lapel and finished with one-button cuffs - this blazer comes with the option of matching fitted pencil tuxedo pants, to form a womens suit.
- Fitted silhouette jacket
- Two flap front pockets (imitation)
- Peak lapel
- Single breasted one button jacket
- Fabric buttons
- Classic cigarette tuxedo pants mid raise

Fabric: 40% viscose, 5% elastane, 55% polyester
(lining: 100% viscose)

For size S: length jacket - 21,5" (54 cm), sleeve length - 24,4" (62 cm)
